primary_changes: Implemented object pooling for Vector2 points
Added dirty flag tracking for optimized rendering
Introduced batched draw calls to minimize GPU state changes
Cached frequently used constants and calculations

patterns_discovered: Rendering optimization using dirty flag tracking
Minimizing GPU state changes with batched draw calls
Centralizing repeated calculations as static/cached values
gotchas_discovered: Garbage collection pressure from frequent Vector2 instantiation
Unnecessary redrawing of graphics without tracking changes
Performance overhead from repeated draw state configuration
recommendations: Use object pooling for frequently created objects
Implement dirty flag tracking for rendering optimizations
Group draw calls by style/state to minimize GPU context switches
Cache repeated calculations as static/class-level constants
Release temporary objects back to pools to reduce memory pressure
